As many of you may have heard, RSU 19 is considering a consolidation of the Hartland, St. Albans, and Somerset Valley buildings as part of the budget process and the building project. We are planning to have the 3rd and 4th grades in St. Albans and Hartland move to the Somerset complex and the Pre-K through grade 2 students attend at the St .Albans building. The first meeting has been held with grade 3 and 4 parents and community members.
The second informational meeting is on Monday, June 5, at 6:00 PM at the St. Albans Consolidated School for PK to grade 2 parents, and any others that would like to attend. Please join us to hear about the outline of our plan and to have an opportunity to ask questions.
